author: Christina Carrega
title: 'NYS Clean' hand sanitizer prison laborer diagnosed with coronavirus
description: The inmate was afraid the virus was in the facility more than two weeks ago.
content:
Earlier this month, an inmate at Great Meadow Correctional Facility began to notice some of the other prisoners were getting sick. Fearful for his life, he called his wife, Renee Evans-Henry.
Evans-Henry said her husband was afraid that the coronavirus had m… [+5289 chars]
